name: Snark Busters: High Society
description:
Test your wits with mind bending puzzles and extreme hidden object fun in Snark Busters: High Society! Solve a devious crime, one that has been pinned on an innocent person. Let your inner detective out, and save the day!
You will be tasked with solving challenging puzzles that would leave anyone else scratching their head. You must speak with charming ghosts who will give you quests to play through to advance the story and thicken the plot. It’s time to play, and catch the Snark!

1 player
50KB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
DUALSHOCK®3
PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera optional
PlayStation®Move navigation controller or Wireless Controller optional.

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®3 systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
